description: Data Self-Portrait is a unique application for tracking life data and artistic visualization. By recording daily data such as sleep, consumption, mood and activities, the application transforms the dull numbers into flowing abstract art graphics, allowing you to "see" your life patterns from a new perspective. The minimalist information visualization design style, combined with the colorful data flow effect, enables your personalized data portrait to continuously evolve with each data addition, showcasing your unique life trajectory. It supports data statistics analysis, historical record management and data export functions. All data is stored locally, ensuring the protection of your privacy and security.

Binance is the world’s largest cryptoasset marketplace by trading volume*. Trusted by 250 million users worldwide, the Binance platform allows you to buy, sell, and hold up to 350 cryptoassets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and Pepe (PEPE) with some of the lowest trading fees in the market.

Risk Warning: Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. 
Not financial advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.
Take 2 mins to learn more:
https://www.binance.com/en-GB/legal/risk-warning.

Binance UK is presently not regulated or authorised by the UK Financial Conduct Authority ("FCA). Investments in cryptoassets are not covered by the Financial Ombudsman Service (“FOS”) or subject to protection under the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (“FSCS”).

Legal Entity: Nest Services Limited, trading as Binance, is the entity ultimately responsible for the Binance Services offered to UK based users through the Binance platform.

*by trading volume - Source: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges


Here's a small sample of what you can do on the Binance App:

- Choose from 350+ listed cryptoassets, set up recurring buys and price alerts, and trade with an arsenal of trading tools at your fingertips.
- Fund your account with a variety of payment options, including credit/debit card, P2P, and bank transfer.
- Automate your cryptoasset investments in a way that suits your preferences using Auto-Invest.
- All user funds are held 1:1 and protected by a Secure Asset Fund for Users (SAFU) worth $1 billion.
- Our ecosystem is built from the ground-up with state-of-the-art security measures, including real-time risk monitoring, stringent KYC protocols, and advanced end-to-end data encryption, to name a few.
- Participate in Binance Launchpad, or grow your portfolio with trading bots.
- In addition to an expansive, constantly-updated FAQ section, our 24/7 live chat customer support is available in English.

Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. Take 2 minutes to learn more (https://cexio.uk/risk_summary/).

The CEX.IO App allows you to trade, sell, and buy Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies. Access a variety of crypto markets and manage your portfolio on the go. Supported payment methods include debit/credit cards, Apple Pay, and bank transfers*.

Customers can buy, sell, and trade the following assets via the CEX.IO App:
Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Polygon (MATIC), Litecoin (LTC), XRP (XRP), Stellar (XLM), Cosmos (ATOM), Dogecoin (DOGE), Shiba Inu (SHIB), Cardano (ADA), USD Coin (USDC), Tether (USDT), Polkadot (DOT), Uniswap (UNI), Zilliqa (ZIL), SushiSwap (SUSHI), and Solana (SOL), along with over 100 other crypto assets.

The CEX.IO App acts like a Bitcoin crypto wallet and offers the following features to manage your portfolio:
- Crypto purchase functionality: The app enables crypto purchases with credit and debit cards, as well as several alternative payment methods.

- Convert service: You can exchange your crypto into fiat or other cryptocurrencies with your available account balance.

- Card deposits and withdrawals: With the CEX.IO App, you can use a Visa or Mastercard credit or debit card issued in any currency.

- Multichain support: Send Bitcoin and other digital assets using 40+ blockchain networks.

- Market and limit orders: We have gathered advanced trading tools and implemented proprietary software that ensures our customers can trade Bitcoin with high liquidity and tight spreads.

- Save your favorite markets: Select preferred currency pairs for quick access and a better user experience.

- Monitor your portfolio performance: Track the changes in your crypto wallet and trading balances on the go.

- User-friendly interface: Purchase, sell, exchange, and store crypto with intuitive app navigation.

- Detailed order and transaction history: Stay informed of your crypto exchange operations, with clear explanations of all fees and commissions.

- Passionate Support Team: Eager to provide professional assistance throughout your crypto journey.

With the CEX.IO App, we combined the most popular CEX.IO ecosystem features and packed them into a straightforward interface. The simple navigation allows everyone to find what they need quickly and easily. Therefore, the app enables you to buy Bitcoin using multiple payment methods.


CEX.IO was one of the first platforms to enable fiat-to-crypto transactions with payment cards. Since our inception in 2013, we’ve chosen to adhere to industry standards and legal regulations applicable to a cryptocurrency exchange. You can check where we are currently registered and licensed on our Legal and Security page (https://cex.io/legal-security).


*Payment methods available depend on the user's country of residence.

description: A aplicação permite aos clientes vinti4 associar os seus cartões bancários ao nº de telemóvel e realizar diversas operações de pagamento como compras nos POS sem cartão, levantamentos nos ATM sem cartão, recargas de telemóvel, pagamento de faturas, transferências, etc. O cliente poderá ainda bloquear o cartão para diversas situações, como bloqueio total do cartão selecionado, bloqueio de compras online, bloqueio de operações nos ATM ou no estrangeiro  traduzindo-se numa ferramenta fundamental para o controlo da segurança dos cartões.

description:

A Caixanet Mobile disponibiliza diversas funcionalidades que lhe permitem ter controlo das suas operações bancárias, de subscrever os produtos da Caixa, com autonomia e segurança.

The MB WAY app is SIBS' digital solution that simplifies your payments by allowing you to do everything in one place! By connecting your mobile phone number to your bank card, you can send, request and receive money, split accounts, generate MB NET virtual cards, shop online and in physical shops with QR Code or NFC and even win prizes. You can track your subscriptions and recurring payments in your app. You can also withdraw cash and use MULTIBANCO just with MB WAY. With MB WAY pulse you can pay with MB WAY even when your smartphone is switched off, without battery or internet access.

All of this always with SIBS security guarantee. The MB WAY app is the No.1 payment app in Portugal and already a reference, with more than 6,5 million users who use its advantages daily, making it the favorite payment app of the Portuguese.

FUNCTIONALITIES
How to pay with MB WAY? 
To pay in shop, when paying for your purchases in physical shops, simply select the "Pagar com MB WAY" button and choose the "QR Code" or "NFC" option. 
- QR Code - After the merchant enters the purchase amount in the terminal and confirms OK, a QR Code is generated. Simply scan this QR Code on the payment terminal. If the purchase is more than the amount without PIN, confirm with your MB WAY PIN, touch ID or face ID.
- NFC - Touch your mobile phone to the payment terminal. If the purchase exceeds the amount without PIN, confirm in the MB WAY app and pull over again.
To pay in online shops, select the MB WAY payment method and enter your mobile phone number. You will receive a notification to confirm the payment with your MB WAY PIN. 

How to buy with MB NET? 
When paying for your online purchases, access the MB WAY app and generate an MB NET card in the "Cartões MB NET" option. Then, on the merchant's website, select pay with card and enter the details of the MB NET card you generated.

How to use MULTIBANCO?
To use the "Utilizar MULTIBANCO” option with the MB WAY app, you must choose the amount you want to withdraw and enter your MB WAY PIN or touch ID. Then, with the generated code, go to a MULTIBANCO ATM, press the green key and choose the "Withdraw Money" option. You can also generate a code for someone else to go to MULTIBANCO to withdraw. You can also use this option “Utilizar MULTIBANCO” to carry out other operations available at MULTIBANCO.

How to send money?
Simply press the "Enviar Dinheiro" button, enter a contact and the amount you want to send and confirm the operation with your MB WAY PIN. The money will be immediately available in your contact's account.

How to request money?
To request money, simply select the "Pedir Dinheiro" button in the app, select the contact you want to request money from, indicate the amount, and confirm the operation. 
You can also request the amount through your personal QR Code.

How to split an account?
To split an account, simply select the "Dividir Conta" button. Then, select the contacts with whom you want to split the bill, indicate the amount of the bill, and confirm the operation. 

How to join authorized payments?
To manage your subscriptions or recurring payments through "Pagamentos Autorizados", simply select this payment method on the participating partner, enter your mobile phone number, confirm on your MB WAY, enter your PIN for confirmation and you're done! 

How to activate MB WAY?
1. Link your bank card at an ATM (MULTIBANCO)
2. Download the app for free and activate it with your mobile number
MB WAY is the only official digital payments app from SIBS, accepted by all major banks in Portugal.

How to activate MB WAY pulse?
Use MB WAY pulse to make contactless payments through another device: bracelet, key ring or clip for your watch, but with the cards you have associated with MB WAY. You can now make purchases with MB WAY pulse without having to have your smartphone with you.

There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay
Say hello to PayPal+, our free loyalty programme that helps you make the most of your money every time you shop with PayPal

SEND & RECEIVE MONEY​
A simple, secure way to quickly send & receive money to friends and family. With encryption technology, we go the distance to help make sure your money transfers are secure

ITS LOYALTY FOR ALL. AND ITS ALL FOR FREE
PayPal+ is the loyalty programme that rewards you with more points, in more ways. Use them almost anywhere PayPal is accepted. And it’s all for free, with no fees and no caps*​
*Rewards are earned as points under the PayPal+ rewards programme. To start earning, you must be enrolled in PayPal+. If you are not yet enrolled, you can sign in the PayPal app. PayPal+ Terms and conditions apply.

MULTIPLY YOUR POINTS WITH THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD​
Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​
* Set up and activation required. Terms and conditions apply

BUY NOW, PAY LATER​
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.* Plus, earn points whenever you use Pay in 3
*Pay in 3 subject to status. Unregulated credit. Available for purchases £20-£3000. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing

SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom
*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply

MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​
Keep track of your different subscriptions at the subscription hub. Easily view, update, or cancel subscriptions, while enjoying updates on recurring payments. Manage recurring payments all in one place. 

POOL MONEY TOGETHER​
Collect money in advance for group gifts, shared experiences, and more and skip the hassle of reimbursement afterward.​
*An account with PayPal is required to create a Pool. Terms and limits apply

PAY HOW YOU WANT​
Add your debit or credit cards* or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout. You’ll even be able to continue collecting rewards points**
*Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)​
**Subject to issuer’s applicable reward programme terms and conditions

PayPal UK Ltd is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) as an electronic money institution (firm reference number 994790); in relation to its regulated consumer credit activities (firm reference number 996405); and for the provision of cryptocurrency services (firm reference number 1000741). Some products and services, such as PayPal Pay in 3 and PayPal Working Capital, are not regulated by the FCA and may offer a lower level of protection. Please read product terms for further details. É um App que permite o acesso aos serviços da Segurança Social de Cabo Verde-
 
O aplicativo móvel é um canal direto de comunicação com o INPS, permitindo ao utente aceder a um conjunto de serviços sem a necessidade de se deslocar a um balcão de atendimento presencial. Oferece uma experiência segura e conveniente, otimizando o seu tempo. Entre os principais serviços disponíveis, destacam-se:
 
Consulta de Direitos: Permite aos usuários consultar seus direitos relacionados à segurança social, como benefícios e aposentadorias.
Consulta da Carreira Contributiva: Oferece aos utentes a possibilidade de visualizar o histórico das suas contribuições à segurança social, essencial para o cálculo de benefícios futuros.
 
Prova de Vida: Facilita o processo de verificação da continuidade de vida, algo essencial para a manutenção de certos benefícios, como Pensão.
 
Consultas presenciais ou virtuais: Marcar atendimento com um representante da segurança social para esclarecer dúvidas ou resolver pendências.
Status atual do processo: Visualizar se o processo está em análise, aguardando documentos ou já foi concluído.

Através do BCADirecto Mobile poderá ter acesso a simuladores de crédito, consulta e simulador de câmbios, lista de Contactos do BCA, noticias em primeira mão, contacto direto com o seu Banco, consulta e movimentação da sua conta entre vários outros serviços para lhe ajudar nas suas necessidades diárias com o seu Banco.

Join the 4 million customers who have already opened a Nickel account!

With Nickel, open an account, get an international Mastercard, and a local IBAN in just 5 minutes!
             
It's simple, fast, and open to everyone, with no conditions. All you need is a valid ID (190 passports accepted) and €25 to open your account.
  
Register online in minutes at https://nickel.eu/ and pick up your card immediately at one of our Nickel points of sale.                      

Once your account is open, you can rely on our mobile app to simplify your daily life!
            
With the Nickel app, you can:

Manage your account daily:
- Check your balance in real time
- Increase or decrease your payment and withdrawal limits
- View your card's PIN code
- Update your personal information     
                
Pay and get paid:
- Make standard and instant transfers 100% free
- Schedule recurring transferts to make your life easier
- View and share your IBAN         

Security:
- Instantly block and unblock your card if you lose it
- Block and unblock online and/or contactless payments.
- Set up personalized alerts to notify you if a transaction exceeds a certain amount or if a payment is made abroad
                
Additional service:
- Access the international money transfer service with Ria
                
Nickel points of sale and customer service:
- Find the nearest Nickel point of sale 
- Check our online FAQs 
- Find out how to contact our customer service

We’ve made it easier for you to manage your Western Union transfers with the Western Union: Self Service app. 

If you need to request money from a friend or family member, track a transfer, redirect an incoming transfer to your bank account, or find a nearby Western Union agent location – we have you covered. 

 

Key features: 


• Request money from your sender 
Do you need extra money? Now you can make money requests from senders in multiple countries whenever you need it. With the Western Union: Self Service app, requesting money has never been easier. 

• Track a money transfer 
To track your money transfer in real time, enter the tracking number (MTCN) and get the real-time status of your money. 

• Redirect transfers 
You can redirect any cash transfer to your bank account for fast and secure access to your funds. 

• Find a Western Union agent location 
Your app can also help you find a nearby Western Union agent location in just a few taps. Remember that our Western Union agent locations are independent businesses providing our money transfer services to our customers. 

• Get in touch with us 

No matter what questions or concerns you may have, we’re here for you. You can also get in touch by visiting a nearby Western Union agent location. 

 


With the Western Union: Self Service app, you can now change the way you receive money in Morocco and the Philippines!

ABOUT CHANGELLY
Changelly is a global crypto exchange platform serving over 10 million users worldwide. Founded in 2015, Changelly offers its customers numerous useful functions and even more.

FIAT-TO-CRYPTO MARKETPLACE
Changelly Buy allows purchasing cryptocurrencies with your credit card (Visa/Mastercard), bank transfer, or Apple Pay. Users can choose offers from the most reputable fiat providers: MoonPay, Banxa, Simplex, Revolut, Unlimit, Topper, Transak, Skrill, Switchere. You can buy crypto with 300+ most popular fiat currencies of almost every region: EUR, USD, GBP, RUB, AUD, CAD, etc.

SELL FUNCTIONALITY
At Changelly, we're dedicated to providing our users with a comprehensive crypto trading experience that includes not only purchases and exchanges but also seamless sales of cryptocurrencies. Through our partnership with the trusted provider MoonPay, you can effortlessly sell Bitcoin (BTC). Our platform supports diverse withdrawal methods, including Visa, Mastercard, and bank transfers, to accommodate your financial preferences.

1,000+ COINS AND TOKENS
Swap between more than 1,000 cryptocurrencies: Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Binance Coin (BNB), Cardano (ADA), Dogecoin (DOGE), Monero (XMR), Shiba Inu (SHIB), ERC-20, BEP-2 tokens, and more.

EXPLORE
With the Explore feature, you can analyze the crypto industry according to real-time market statistics! Follow and read the most recent insights on crypto from handpicked news providers on the go. Filter, add to bookmarks, and share the most exciting crypto news with friends. Add favorite coins to your Watchlist and track their ups and downs.

Com esta App, tem a Caixa sempre à mão, 24h/dia. Pode aceder às suas contas, da Caixa e de outros bancos, fazer ou agendar pagamentos, transferências e muito mais.

Mantenha a app sempre atualizada e partilhe a App Caixadirecta com os seus amigos ou familiares e use o botão de "Feedback", disponível na APP, para ajudar a melhorar a sua experiência.

"How much am I spending each month? Are my savings growing? How expensive was the last vacation? What were my business expenses this year?"

If you're asking yourself any of these questions, CashTrails is here to help, featuring:

GENERAL:
• Tracking both expenses and income.
• Seamless sync via iCloud.
• Support for multiple accounts and transfers between them.
• All records, accounts, tags, parties and groups can be edited or deleted at any time.
• Photo attachments.
• Passcode protection to hide your financial data from unwanted eyes.
• Recurring records, both expenses and incomes, with rich frequency options.
• History to view and adjust your previous records.
• Tags to organize your records the way you like.
• Ability to specify vendors/payees and clients/payers (parties).
• Groups to separate your regular expenses from business or holiday trips.
• Time of records is recorded as well.
• "Refund" records.
• Calculator.
• Search.

REPORTS:
• Flexible, configurable reports.
• Timeline bar graph reports for days, weeks, months, and years, with whatever filter you set.
• Structure of expenses and income, split by tags, parties, accounts or groups, in percentages and absolute amounts, for any report filter.
• Daily, weekly and monthly averages.
• Reports for particular hours.
• Instant account balances.
• Report filter presets - switch between your favorite reports with just a tap.

MULTIPLE CURRENCIES:
• Full support for over 160 world currencies.
• Quick toggle between the currencies you're using most often.

EXPORT AND IMPORT:
• Ability to analyze your records in a spreadsheet using CSV export.
• Backup and restore CashTrails data and settings.

developer: Credito Agricola Servicos - Centro de Servicos Partilhados ACE
description:
Descarregue a App CA Mobile e tenha a gestão das suas finanças sempre à mão!

A App CA Mobile do Crédito Agrícola foi renovada para lhe proporcionar uma experiência mais moderna, intuitiva e personalizável. Agora, pode gerir as suas contas, pagamentos e cartões de forma rápida, segura e simples, onde e quando quiser.

Se é Cliente do Crédito Agrícola, aceda directamente à app e faça login com os seus códigos habituais. Se ainda não é Cliente, aproveite para abrir conta online com a Nova App e aproveite todas as vantagens de um banco digital.

Principais Funcionalidades disponíveis:

Gestão Personalizada com o “Meu CA”

- Widgets Personalizáveis: Configure a app ao seu gosto com os widgets mais úteis para o seu dia-a-dia.
- Gestão de Perfil: Actualize e controle as suas informações pessoais.

Contas e Poupança

- Feed de Actividade: Acompanhe todos os movimentos das suas contas com um novo formato visual.
- Comprovativos de Operações: Obtenha facilmente os comprovativos e extractos bancários das suas transacções.
- Créditos: Consulte informações sobre os seus créditos (Crédito Pessoal, Crédito Habitação, entre outros) de forma clara e organizada.
- Aceder à CA Poupança My Project: Conta Poupança à medida dos seus objectivos financeiros.

Movimentos e Pagamentos

- Transferências Simplificadas: Envie dinheiro para os seus contactos, contas CA e nacionais, e transferências bancárias internacionais (SEPA).
- MB WAY: Usufrua das funcionalidades MB WAY para transferências rápidas e seguras, como pagamentos e levantar dinheiro com MB WAY.
- Pagamentos de Serviços: Pague facturas de serviços, Estado, Segurança Social e carregue o telemóvel directamente na app.

Gestão de Cartões

- Cartões CA: Consulte o saldo e movimentos dos seus cartões de crédito e débito.
- Aderir ao Apple Pay: Adicione os seus cartões à Wallet e pode pagar com Apple Pay.
- Criar Cartões Virtuais para compras online seguras, com validação em máxima segurança através do serviço 3D Secure.

Produtos e Serviços Exclusivos

- Contratar CA Crédito Pronto (crédito imediato para Clientes elegíveis).
- Depósitos a Prazo: Constitua Depósitos a Prazo DP Net e DP Net Super.
- CA Teen: Configure e controle o GR8 da App CA Teen, cartão multibanco pré-pago para os jovens Clientes do CA.

Outras Funcionalidades

- Login Seguro por Biometria: Aceda à app com Face ID ou Touch ID.
- Recuperação fácil de Dados e informações de login.
- Operações Favoritas: Guarde e aceda rapidamente às suas operações mais frequentes.
- Possibilidade de aderir aos Canais Digitais do CA e Abertura de Conta.
- Consultar a Localização e Contactos das Agências Crédito Agrícola.

Descarregue agora a App CA Mobile para o apoiar nos momentos necessários da sua vida financeira.

With AliceBob Wallet, you can securely manage your cryptocurrency portfolio, buy and send Bitcoin instantly, and access a wide range of digital assets and features. Our next-gen security and extensive support for various blockchains make it a versatile and comprehensive solution for all your crypto needs.

Next-Gen Security
Our wallet prioritizes cutting-edge security measures, ensuring you retain complete control over your private keys. AliceBob Wallet is a self-custodial wallet that adheres to industry standards such as OWASP MASVS. We implement advanced cryptographic methods including BIP32, BIP39, and BIP44 to protect your digital assets like Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH) from security risks.

1,000+ Coins and Tokens
Exchange and manage over 1,000 cryptocurrencies with AliceBob Wallet. You can buy Bitcoin and trade it for popular options like Ethereum, Binance Coin (BNB), Cardano, Dogecoin, Monero, and many others. Our wallet’s versatility ensures you have access to a wide array of digital assets.

Comprehensive Crypto Management
AliceBob Wallet allows you to effortlessly create and manage your cryptocurrency portfolio. Securely store your Bitcoin and other coins in one place, conduct seamless transactions, and trade among over 1,000 different assets. Additionally, choose between fixed or floating exchange rates on centralized exchanges (CEX) or opt for a decentralized exchange (DEX) experience.

Easy Crypto Purchases
Buying Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies is simplified with AliceBob Wallet. Choose from trusted fiat providers like MoonPay, Banxa, Simplex, and Wert to purchase crypto using credit cards, bank transfers, or other methods. You can buy Bitcoin with a bank account in over 200 different fiat currencies, including EUR, USD, GBP, AUD, and many more. The process is straightforward and quick, allowing you to buy and send Bitcoin instantly.

Portfolio Manager and Price Alerts
Stay informed with AliceBob Wallet’s portfolio manager. Access detailed insights into your holdings and customize real-time alerts for Bitcoin price and other market data. Make informed decisions and buy Bitcoin when the timing is right.

Access Leading DApps
Connect to top decentralized applications directly from AliceBob Wallet. Manage your DeFi activity with AAVE, Sushi, PancakeSwap, 1inch, Tornado Cash, and Compound — lend, borrow, swap, and stake crypto securely while keeping full control of your assets.

Elirox is an automated trading app that helps you trade smart and simple. Launch trading bots in financial markets right from your phone, without any complicated setups. Get the app and automate your trading today.

EASY TO START

With Elirox, trading becomes easier. Start automating your trades in a few steps:

- Choose an asset (currency, index, share, or another financial instrument).
- Set up trading parameters yourself, or make it even easier with the AI assistant—it selects the settings for your strategy based on your chosen asset and investment amount.
- Start the bot and check the results in detailed analytics.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR TRADING STRATEGY

Elirox is designed for both beginners and experts, and everything is straightforward, regardless of your experience level. You can set up a strategy that best suits your needs:

- Choose from various trading indicators, including RSI, CCI, and MACD, to enhance your trading decisions and market analysis.
- Modify risk management settings to protect your investments effectively.
- Use advanced trading filters to automatically stop the bot when needed.
- Visualize your trading algorithm with convenient real-time charts that track live market quotes.

SEAMLESS BROKER INTEGRATION

Linking your broker to Elirox is quick and easy, whether you use Doto, Exness, or another platform. The intuitive interface guides you through each step, making account setup smooth so you can start trading in minutes.

TRY A DEMO FIRST

If you’d like to practice first, you can start with a demo account. It comes with virtual funds, letting you experiment with the bots and see how they work—without any risk.

- Practice and explore how the app works without any risk.
- Get comfortable with the features before trading with real money.

GET SUPPORT

Our customer support team is here to help with any questions. Use our guides to learn about all the settings and possibilities, or reach out to us via email or live chat.
